short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to customize the font when chatting on ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customize your ChatGPT experience by changing the font style!

ChatGPT Font Changer is a simple and intuitive Chrome extension that allows you to personalize the fonts used during your ChatGPT conversations. Whether you prefer a clean, professional look or something more creative, this extension gives you full control over the appearance of your ChatGPT interface.

Features:
- Easily toggle the font customization on or off with a single click.
- Choose from a variety of system fonts, including popular options and those specifically suited for readability.
- Lightweight and easy to use â€” the control panel is conveniently accessible from the ChatGPT interface.

Why Choose ChatGPT Font Changer?
Make your ChatGPT experience uniquely yours by applying the font style that best fits your preferences. Whether for comfort, accessibility, or fun, this extension gives you the freedom to adjust the appearance of your chats.

Note: This extension is specifically designed for use with chatgpt.com and may not function on other websites.
